long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Ad Library covers content from Facebook, Pinterest, and other ad libraries, making it a powerful assistant for you to get adinspiration. Easily download high-resolution ad videos with one click, injecting fresh blood into your adcampaigns. Moreover, we provide comprehensive ad data export functions, including ad titles, CTAs, ad likes, ad landing page links, ad video URLs, etc., allowing you to see the adeffect at a glance.

Ad library function:
ğŸ¯ One-click save: Easily click to save your favorite ad to your ad library.
ğŸš€ Quick access: Enter the adworld anytime, anywhere through the adlibrary button on the extension.
ğŸ’¼ Data Export: Free your hands, automatically export all addata, saving time and effort.

You will enjoy the following conveniences:
ğŸ’¾ Download advideos: Download advideos anytime, anywhere to provide rich materials for your creation
ğŸ“‚ Efficient management: Use folder and group functions to easily organize your ad library and keep your content organized.
ğŸ”— Share ad: Easily share ad content with team members or partners through quick links.

How to download Pinterest ad library videos?
1ï¸âƒ£ Add the ad library to the Chrome toolbar to easily pin the ad library.
2ï¸âƒ£ Click the expansion icon to enter the Ad Library adlibrary and explore exciting ad.
3ï¸âƒ£ Click the Save button to save the ad video to your library.
4ï¸âƒ£ Go to the ad library, check and download saved videos and other ad data.

Whether you are a content creator, social media manager, adagency, or Internet celebrity, Ad Library is your indispensable assistant. It can help you easily plan and research adcampaigns, improve productivity, and take your adto the next level!
ğŸ’Œ If you have any questions or feedback, please feel free to contact us through service@adslibrary.ai, we look forward to working with you to create a new chapter in ad!
